title: API doc out of date
description:
The API documentation at 
http://jakarta.apache.org/lucene/docs/api/index.html 
claims to be at version 1.3-FINAL , but some things are missing. For example, 
RangeQuery's field() method is not described, although it had been made "public" 
almost 6 month ago.

comments.content:
I cannot reproduce my own bug report now. Seems like I was mixing up things, 
so I'm closing this.
comments.author: Daniel Naber
